name: Buff Bird Climbing Simulator
description:
Play as Buff Bird - an incredibly buff bird! Scale a climbing wall to (hopefully) escape the hungry Cat.

CONTROLS

Reach with mouse

Grab with Left hand using left click and hold (trackpad users can use A or left arrow key)
Grab with Right hand using right click and hold (trackpad users can use D or right arrow key)

Watch the side bar! it shows your height on the wall as well as the cat's height.

Try to reach the top before the cat gets you!

-p.s. whatever you do, don't try the hardest difficulty... it is nearly impossible - on purpose MUAHAHA
